ExtDesc.message: Addon for managing tabs, containers (contextual identities) and bookmarks in sidebar. Supports both flat and tree tabs layouts, per-container include/exclude rules, proxy configs for each container and much more.

KbOpenNewTabInCurrPanel.message: Open new tab in active panel

KbOpenNewTabAfter.message: Open new tab after active tab

KbOpenNewTabAsFirstChild.message: Open new tab as the first child of active tab

KbOpenNewTabAsLastChild.message: Open new tab as the last child of active tab

KbRm.message: Remove selected items or active tab

KbActPanelPrevActTab.message: Active tabs history of panel: Back

KbActPanelNextActTab.message: Active tabs history of panel: Next

KbMoveTabToAct.message: Move selected tabs to the active tab

KbMoveTabToPanel0.message: Move active tab to first panel

KbMoveTabToPanel1.message: Move active tab to second panel

KbMoveTabToPanel2.message: Move active tab to third panel

KbMoveTabToPanel3.message: Move active tab to fourth panel

KbMoveTabToPanel4.message: Move active tab to fifth panel

KbMoveTabToPanel5.message: Move active tab to sixth panel

KbMoveTabToPanel6.message: Move active tab to seventh panel

KbMoveTabToPanel7.message: Move active tab to eighth panel

KbMoveTabToPanel8.message: Move active tab to ninth panel

KbMoveTabToPanel9.message: Move active tab to tenth panel
